faqs.title: Returns Policy
faqs.answer: Vehicles returnable within 7 days or 250 km, restocking fee ₹5,000, refund to original payment method after inspection.

faqs.title: Exchange Policy
faqs.answer: One-time exchange within 10 days; pay price difference before redelivery.

faqs.title: Delivery Policy
faqs.answer: Standard delivery 3–7 business days metro; 7–14 remote. Inspect upon delivery.

faqs.title: Warranty Policy
faqs.answer: Certified cars have 12-month/20,000 km powertrain warranty; consumables excluded.

faqs.title: Service Policy
faqs.answer: Service every 10,000 km/12 months; prepaid plans available.

faqs.title: EV Battery Warranty
faqs.answer: 8 years/160,000 km; capacity below 70% qualifies for repair or replacement.

faqs.title: Roadside Assistance
faqs.answer: 24×7 coverage; towing up to 50 km included; extra km billed.

faqs.title: Financing Policy
faqs.answer: Min 10% down payment; tenure 12–84 months; early foreclosure fee 2% in first year.

faqs.title: Cancellation Policy
faqs.answer: Cancel before delivery scheduling for full refund; ₹2,000 fee once scheduled.

faqs.title: Test Drive Policy
faqs.answer: 30-minute max with staff; license and Aadhaar required.

faqs.title: Parts Returns Policy
faqs.answer: Unopened parts returnable within 30 days; electrical parts non-returnable once installed.

faqs.title: Privacy Notice
faqs.answer: We process KYC and telematics with consent; no data sales; deletion on request.
